About Myself

Hello! My name is Malik, welcome to my virtual resume! I have a degree in Computer science (Hons) from CarletonU (Proud Raven!). I have plenty of ideas in my head, passion in my veins, hardwork in my DNA and learning is my weapon of choice. My speciality is, never giving up and getting work done right and in time.

Activites

I believe playing any competitive sport forces you to stay composed under pressure and also trains you to effectively strategize your moves against your opponent's. Playing competitive sports keeps you disciplined, true to yourself and on your toes. I have a knack for cricket, basketball, baseball, football, tennis, and squash.

Work

Extracurricular

Our team raised over $5000 for the Canadian Cancer Society, relay for life. My role in the team was to provide digital marketing support, I made the campaign website, social media banners and other digital material to get the word out.
As the designated note taker for the students with disabilities, I attended all the assigned classes, took detailed and legible notes of each lecture, typed up all the lecture notes and submitted them to the PMC within 48 hours after each class.
As a digital media executive I was responsible for creating digital content for the club. I also managed the club's facebook page that has over 3000 subscribers/likes.
Designed web pages, posters and other marketing material for various club events at Carleton. I designed creative and striking posters, online content and social media banners using range of abode design tools.
